bio: 我是FFKQ，在OP刚上线我就开始屯OP,并不断累积，当然是在OK交易所里，并订阅了MIRROR时刻关注着OP的发展，并购买了发行的NFT,前两次空投都没有赶上，希望这次有机会获得空投！非常感谢！
contributionDescription: I have been holding and accumulating OP from the beginning of the issuance to now. I am always paying attention to the development of OP. I have subscribed to MIRROR and purchased NFT. As the second-layer network of Ethereum, I believe there will be more supporters! As a supporter of OP, I hope that more friends will join OP’s team. Of course, there are more competitors in the second-tier network than OP, such as ARB. Of course, I hope that OP can win in the numerous competitions. Stand out and hope to have the same bright future as Ethereum! This requires the joint support and efforts of you and me! ! ! If I am lucky enough to receive an airdrop, I will invest in OP for a longer period of time. In fact, the development of OP is inseparable from cryptocurrency support

contributionLinks.description: 小狐狸钱包不如交易所交易方便，大部分是在交易所购买并囤积OP

impactDescription: Hope it develops better! Our country is not very friendly to cryptocurrency, but I try my best to introduce and recommend OP to my friends around me. Due to the influence of the general environment, I believe that the future world will be decentralized and interconnected! Of course, I hope that OP can develop better in the next wave of the world! Since my assets belong to personal privacy, the OP tokens in the exchange are not convenient to display, because there are other assets such as ETH. Of course, I hope that all my personal privacy The information will not be leaked. I hope you can respect my privacy. I will support the OP as always! ! ! ! ! !

fundingSources.description: 这是我目前在OK交易所购买并持有的，随着时间会积累更多的

pwFlaggedReason: The application should be flagged because it is partially in a language other than English which violates rule 11 of the grant program rules.
pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, NFTs, Tokenization Platforms, Smart Contract Platforms, Web3 Community Platform
